entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. A few flurries near the Cariboo mountains this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Amount 4 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
